page.title: 10Transport in Shoreham
page.content: The general consensus of the residents of Shoreham beach, about the transport and communication in that and the surrounding area was that the roads were very poor. Over 60% of the people interviewed being appalled with the state of the roads and only 2% feeling they were good. The most popular form of transport was the bicycle but the car was the most popular means of travelling to work. A fourteenth of the people interviewed were either unemployed or retired. An overall total of 6% of people interviewed travelled to work by motorcycle or moped, this was far less than expected obviously these forms of transport are now out ot favour.
